Loss Computation</div><div style="line-height: 18px;"><div style="line-height: 18px;">(Local) </div></div></div></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-74"> <mxGeometry x="580" width="250" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-85" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;flowAnimation=1;" edge="1" parent="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-74" source="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-71" target="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-73"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-71" value="<div style="color: rgb(216, 222, 233); background-color: rgb(26, 26, 26); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; line-height: 18px; white-space: pre;"><div style="line-height: 18px;"><div style="line-height: 18px;">4. Backward Pass </div><div style="line-height: 18px;"><div style="line-height: 18px;"> (Parallel) </div></div></div></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-74"> <mxGeometry x="590" y="140" width="250" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-72" value="<div style="color: rgb(216, 222, 233); background-color: rgb(26, 26, 26); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; line-height: 18px; white-space: pre;"><div style="line-height: 18px;"><div style="line-height: 18px;"><div style="line-height: 18px;"><div style="line-height: 18px;">6. Parameter Update </div><div style="line-height: 18px;"><div style="line-height: 18px;">(Broadcast)</div></div></div></div></div></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-74"> <mxGeometry y="140" width="250" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-86" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;flowAnimation=1;" edge="1" parent="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-74" source="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-73" target="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-72"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-73" value="<div style="color: rgb(216, 222, 233); background-color: rgb(26, 26, 26); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; line-height: 18px; white-space: pre;"><div style="line-height: 18px;"><div style="line-height: 18px;"><div style="line-height: 18px;"> 5. Gradient Sync </div><div style="line-height: 18px;"><div style="line-height: 18px;">(all_reduce)</div></div></div></div></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-74"> <mxGeometry x="295" y="140" width="250" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-84" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.458;entryY=0.014;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;flowAnimation=1;" edge="1" parent="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-74" source="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-70" target="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-71"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-75" value="<div style="color: rgb(216, 222, 233); background-color: rgb(26, 26, 26); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-weight: normal; line-height: 18px; white-space: pre;"><div style=""><span style="color: rgb(216, 222, 233);"><font style="font-size: 20px;">EXECUTION FLOW </font></span></div></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="UlePBLLmDWZP_6NBDI-z-76"> <mxGeometry x="395" y="10" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
color: rgb(216, 222, 233); background-color: rgb(26, 26, 26); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, "Courier New", monospace; line-height: 18px; white-space: pre;
line-height: 18px;
line-height: 18px;
line-height: 18px;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
